top_caption: When you open the fridge at night.
bottom_caption: But only find vegetables.

top_caption: When someone asks for directions.
bottom_caption: And you barely know your own way.

top_caption: When your crush texts you.
bottom_caption: And it's just 'Hi'.

top_caption: When you start a new diet.
bottom_caption: And see your favorite pizza.

top_caption: When you get a new phone.
bottom_caption: And you drop it on day one.

top_caption: When you think you aced the test.
bottom_caption: But get the lowest score.

top_caption: When you try to parallel park.
bottom_caption: And it takes 20 minutes.

top_caption: When you see your ex.
bottom_caption: Looking better than ever.

top_caption: When you find money in your pocket.
bottom_caption: And it's just a receipt.

top_caption: When you wake up early.
bottom_caption: On a Saturday.

top_caption: When you're on a diet.
bottom_caption: And your friend offers you cake.

top_caption: When you buy a new plant.
bottom_caption: And it dies within a week.

top_caption: When you're about to sneeze.
bottom_caption: But it disappears.

top_caption: When you're in the shower.
bottom_caption: And the hot water runs out.

top_caption: When you're at a party.
bottom_caption: And the WiFi is down.

top_caption: When you're at the gym.
bottom_caption: And the only treadmill is taken.

top_caption: When you tell a joke.
bottom_caption: And no one laughs.

top_caption: When you order a salad.
bottom_caption: And it's mostly lettuce.

top_caption: When you set an alarm.
bottom_caption: And you wake up before it goes off.

top_caption: When you're in a hurry.
bottom_caption: And all the traffic lights are red.

top_caption: When you're looking for your phone.
bottom_caption: And you're talking on it.

top_caption: When you're trying to be serious.
bottom_caption: And you burst out laughing.

top_caption: When you're at the dentist.
bottom_caption: And they ask questions with tools in your mouth.

top_caption: When you see a spider.
bottom_caption: And suddenly become an Olympic sprinter.

bottom_caption: And your stomach decides to growl.

top_caption: When you're home alone.
bottom_caption: And you hear a noise.

bottom_caption: And your salad is 99% croutons.

bottom_caption: And you forget what you were saying.

bottom_caption: And you spill your drink.

bottom_caption: And your camera freezes on a weird face.

bottom_caption: And you forget what you came for.
